subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Maya Moore is used to winning titles at Connecticut. Now she is ready to take that mentality to the Minnesota Lynx, which selected her with the first pick in the W.N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Maya Moore is used to winning titles at Connecticut. Now she is ready to take that mentality to the Minnesota Lynx, which selected her with the first pick in the W.N.B.A. draft.
